data.title: Fruit Word
data.statement: You are given some lines of text containing the names of fruits. Your task is to determine how many times each fruit appears, and identify which fruit has the highest count.

testCases.title: Basket1
testCases.testIn:
3
apple banana apple
orange apple banana banana 
grape apple orange
testCases.testOut:
apple - 4, banana - 3, grape - 1, orange - 2
The Fruit apple has the highest count.

testCases.title: Basket1 Validator
testCases.testIn:

grape apple orange

data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: An integer representing the number of lines of text to analyze, denoted as [[numberOfLines]].
<<Next [[numberOfLines]] lines>>: Each [[line]] contains a string of fruit names.
data.outputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: A string consisting of all fruit counts in the format [[fruit]] {{-}} [[count]] for each fruit name. The fruit names should be sorted alphabetically, separated by a comma and a space.

<<Line 2>>: A string indicating the fruit with the highest count, based on the following conditions:
-If a single fruit has the highest count, output {{The Fruit [[fruitName]] has the highest count.}}.
-If all fruits have the same count, output {{The Fruit Counts are equal.}}.
-If some but not all the fruits have the highest count, output {{Fruits are not equal.}}.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given some lines of text containing the names of fruits. Your task is to determine how many times each fruit appears, and identify which fruit has the highest count.
Input
Line 1: An integer representing the number of lines of text to analyze, denoted as numberOfLines.
Next numberOfLines lines: Each line contains a string of fruit names.
Output
Line 1: A string consisting of all fruit counts in the format fruit - count for each fruit name. The fruit names should be sorted alphabetically, separated by a comma and a space.

Line 2: A string indicating the fruit with the highest count, based on the following conditions:
-If a single fruit has the highest count, output The Fruit fruitName has the highest count..
-If all fruits have the same count, output The Fruit Counts are equal..
-If some but not all the fruits have the highest count, output Fruits are not equal..
Constraints
1 ≤ numberOfLines ≤ 10.
Each line contains a string of fruit names separated by spaces.
Example
Input
3
apple banana apple
orange apple banana banana 
grape apple orange
Output
apple - 4, banana - 3, grape - 1, orange - 2
The Fruit apple has the highest count.
